languages.text: [Добить Паскаля] "Прости, но калека будет только обузой при побеге".
[Kill Pasqal] "A cripple will only be a hindrance during the escape. I hope you understand."
languages.original_text: [Добить Паскаля] "Прости, но калека будет только обузой при побеге".

languages.text: ［パスカルを殺す］「体の不自由な者は脱出の邪魔になる。理解してくれ」
languages.original_text: [Kill Pasqal] "A cripple will only be a hindrance during the escape. I hope you understand."

traits.locale_text: ［パスカルを殺す］「体の不自由な者は脱出の邪魔になる。理解してくれ」

languages.text: [杀死帕斯卡]“像你这样的残废，在逃跑过程中只会成为障碍。我希望你能理解。”
languages.original_text: [Kill Pasqal] "A cripple will only be a hindrance during the escape. I hope you understand."

traits.locale_text: [杀死帕斯卡]“像你这样的残废，在逃跑过程中只会成为障碍。我希望你能理解。”

languages.text: [Matar a Pasqal] «Un tullido solo sería un estorbo durante la huida. Espero que pueda entenderlo».
languages.original_text: [Kill Pasqal] "A cripple will only be a hindrance during the escape. I hope you understand."

traits.locale_text: [Matar a Pasqal] «Un tullido solo sería un estorbo durante la huida. Espero que pueda entenderlo».

languages.text: [Pasqal töten] "Ein Krüppel behindert uns bei der Flucht nur. Ich hoffe, Ihr versteht das."
languages.original_text: [Kill Pasqal] "A cripple will only be a hindrance during the escape. I hope you understand."

traits.locale_text: [Pasqal töten] "Ein Krüppel behindert uns bei der Flucht nur. Ich hoffe, Ihr versteht das."

languages.text: [Tuer Pasqal] « Nous ne pouvons nous encombrer d'un infirme si nous voulons avoir une chance de nous enfuir. J'espère que vous comprenez. »
languages.original_text: [Kill Pasqal] "A cripple will only be a hindrance during the escape. I hope you understand."

traits.locale_text: [Tuer Pasqal] « Nous ne pouvons nous encombrer d'un infirme si nous voulons avoir une chance de nous enfuir. J'espère que vous comprenez. »

languages.text: [Pasqal'ı öldür] "Kötürümün teki, buradan kaçarken bize ayak bağı olur. Umarım mazur görürsün."
languages.original_text: [Kill Pasqal] "A cripple will only be a hindrance during the escape. I hope you understand."

traits.locale_text: [Pasqal'ı öldür] "Buradan kaçarken yanımızda kötürümün tekinin olması bize ayak bağı olur. Umarım mazur görürsün."
